column2: „Tatini sinovi“ ne primaju platu kad ništa ne rade na poslu.
column3: "Daddy's boys don't receive paychecks when they don't do anything at work

column2: Navijači iz Mostara, koji su rođeni poslije rata, se ne tuku međusobno.
column3: Supporters from Mostar, who are born after the war, don't fight among themselves

column2: Žena iz Cima, koja je radila na Rondou, nije prije svake utakmice morala sklanjati auto da joj ga navijači ne oštete.
column3: A woman from Cim, who worked at Rondo, didn't have to move her car every time before the game, so that hooligans don't damage it

column2: Za dečkom iz Cima koji je u majici Ultrasa prolazio Bulevarom, nisu potrčale osobe iz kafića na Bulevaru.
column3: People from a cafe on Bulevar didn't chase a guy who was passing by wearing an Ultras t-shirt

column2: Odrasli ne koriste stalno mobitele.
column3: Adults don't use their phones all the time.

column2: Čovjek iz Cima može zaboraviti zaključati vozilo, ali opet nitko ne ukrade ništa iz njega.
column3: A guy from Cim can forget to lock his vehicle, but stil no one will steal anything from it

column2: Promet ne predstavlja opasnost za djecu tijekom dana u Cimu.
column3: The traffic isn't dangerous for kids during the day in Cim

column2: Policija propisuje kazne za nepropisno odlaganje otpada.
column3: Police gives fines for throwing the trash irregularly

column2: Male stepenice na Bijelom Brijegu su osvijetljene pa se nitko ne boji ići tuda po mraku.
column3: Small steps on Bijeli Brijeg are ilumminated so no one's afraid to go there when it's dark

column2: Velike stepenice na Bijelom Brijegu su osvijetljene pa se nitko ne boji ići tuda po mraku.
column3: Big steps on Bijeli Brijeg are ilumminated so no one's afraid to go there when it's dark

column2: Majka se ne brine za sigurnost sina koji je otišao u disko, pa ga ne zove 5-6 puta sina da vidi kad će kući.
column3: A mother isn't concerned for her son's safety who went to a disco, so she doesn't call him 5-6 times to see when he's coming home

column2: Žena, koja je izgubila muža u ratu, ne gleda osobe, koje su tijekom rata bile u izbjeglištvu, kroz taj nesretni događaj.
column3: A woman, who lost a husband during the war, doesn't look at people, who've been abroad during the war, through that unlucky event
